title: Flawless Technique LF Platinum+ Top laner
body:
My team 'Flawless Technique' is a casual, fun, serious team that in the greater scheme of things just want to play as many games together as possible, we already have very capable people filling the roles of support, jungle, adc and mid lane with everybody being high plat by the end of S5 and steadily climbing up via dynamic que (dynamic que 3-4man win rate of about 78%).
We are currently trying top laners, we have a few applicants atm that we are working through but just in case they dont work out feel free to let us know if you are interested, we would prefer that you are plat+ currently or ended the 2015 season in high plat or diamond. Two of our current roster played together in a previous ranked team and achieved diamond in ranked 5's by the end of the season before the team disbanded and we are currently looking to repeat that success with a newer roster. Since the two who moved over (adc,supp) were mainly the shot callers as well we believe with the talented enough roster this should by no means be a hard goal to achieve.
Requirements:
- mic
- a lot of free time since we play whenever we have 5 on
- Willing to follow the meta (let you play champions you are godlike on tho)
Please message on here and add 'i am flawless' to your friendslist and let him know that you are interested in the top lane position
BTW please remember you arent the only one playing for the spot, so dont be disappointed if we dont pick you since there are a lot of talented individuals out there, and sometimes we just prefer someone who meshes well with the team even if you are in our eyes equally good mechanically and with game knowledge.
